abstract: It’s now possible to target customers in all sorts of new ways. Have you tried any of them?
snippet: It’s now possible to target customers in all sorts of new ways. Have you tried any of them?
lead_paragraph: We recently posted a guide to marketing with Facebook. One of the main points of the guide, written by Kermit Pattison, is that you now have the opportunity to target your customers at precisely the right moment. For example, from the guide:

headline.main: Have You Tried Marketing Your Business With Facebook?
